title: The Adventures Of Lolo The Penguin(1986) ENGLISH HARDSUB VERSION

sources.title: The Adventures Of Lolo The Penguin(1986) ENGLISH HARDSUB VERSION
sources.description: DISCRETION: THIS IS THE ORIGINAL RUSSIAN LANGUAGE VERSION! THIS VERSION IS COMPLETELY UNEDITED! WARNING: THIS FILM CONTAINS SCENES OF VIOLENCE! THERE IS BLOOD IN THIS FILM! THIS VIDEO DEALS WITH POACHING IN THE FINAL PART! THIS FILM IS NOT FOR THE FAINT OF HEART! Original Russian Title:  Priklyucheniya pingvinenka Lolo. Film pervyy This is a Soviet-Japanese coproduction  Plot:  The movie tells the tale of Lolo, an Adélie penguin, from his hatching to his adulthood, and the adventures he goes on. It begins as a slice-of-life story , but about halfway through, it becomes an adventure story all from a penguin's point-of-view. Through the course of the movie, Lolo makes friends, meets humans, tries to fly, floats away on an iceberg, escapes from a poacher ship, poachers invade, and the penguins all lead a fight against the invading poachers.
